Plot: A military special operations team, led by a CIA case officer, are on a mission in the harsh and hostile terrain of Afghanistan where they find themselves in a Middle Eastern "Bermuda Triangle" of ancient evil.
Title: The Objective
Writer: Daniel Myrick (screenplay), Mark A. Patton (screenplay), Wesley Clark (screenplay), Daniel Myrick (story), Mark A. Patton (story)
Actors: Jonas Ball, Matthew R. Anderson, Jon Huertas, Michael C. Williams
